name: Arcade Survivors (Vojtěch Brůža, linalet)
description:
After long shift at the arcade store...

Your shift was almost over, when you heard a strange noise. It was coming from that one room nobody ever goes into. Your curiosity won over your best judgement and you walked in...

Much to your horror, the game characters escaped their digital imprisonment.

How long can you survive?

You will need a controller for the second player.
We plan to add keyboard in the future. ;)

Just use WSAD or Left Stick to move.

Press any button to join...
